t: John 16
These*p things have I spoken unto you, that ye should not be offended.
They*rp shall*r put*r you*r out*r of*r the*r synagogues:*r yea,*r the*r time*r cometh,*r that*r whosoever*r killeth*r you*r will*r think*r that*r he*r doeth*r God*r service.*r
And*rp these*r things*r will*r they*r do*r unto*r you,*r because*r they*r have*r not*r known*r the*r Father,*r nor*r me.*r

But*rp these*r things*r have*r I*r told*r you,*r that*r when*r the*r time*r shall*r come,*r ye*r may*r remember*r that*r I*r told*r you*r of*r them.*r And*r these*r things*r I*r said*r not*r unto*r you*r at*r the*r beginning,*r because*r I*r was*r with*r you.*r
But*rp now*r I*r go*r my*r way*r to*r him*r that*r sent*r me;*r and*r none*r of*r you*r asketh*r me,*r Whither*r goest*r thou?*r
But*rp because*r I*r have*r said*r these*r things*r unto*r you,*r sorrow*r hath*r filled*r your*r heart.*r

Nevertheless*rp I*r tell*r you*r the*r truth;*r It*r is*r expedient*r for*r you*r that*r I*r go*r away:*r for*r if*r I*r go*r not*r away,*r the*r Comforter*r will*r not*r come*r unto*r you;*r but*r if*r I*r depart,*r I*r will*r send*r him*r unto*r you.*r
And*rp when*r he*r is*r come,*r he*r will*r reprove*r the*r world*r of*r sin,*r and*r of*r righteousness,*r and*r of*r judgment:*r
Of*rp sin,*r because*r they*r believe*r not*r on*r me;*r
Of*rp righteousness,*r because*r I*r go*r to*r my*r Father,*r and*r ye*r see*r me*r no*r more;*r
Of*rp judgment,*r because*r the*r prince*r of*r this*r world*r is*r judged.*r
I*rp have*r yet*r many*r things*r to*r say*r unto*r you,*r but*r ye*r cannot*r bear*r them*r now.*r

Howbeit*rp when*r he,*r the*r Spirit*r of*r truth,*r is*r come,*r he*r will*r guide*r you*r into*r all*r truth:*r for*r he*r shall*r not*r speak*r of*r himself;*r but*r whatsoever*r he*r shall*r hear,*r that*r shall*r he*r speak:*r and*r he*r will*r shew*r you*r things*r to*r come.*r
He*rp shall*r glorify*r me:*r for*r he*r shall*r receive*r of*r mine,*r and*r shall*r shew*r it*r unto*r you.*r
All*rp things*r that*r the*r Father*r hath*r are*r mine:*r therefore*r said*r I,*r that*r he*r shall*r take*r of*r mine,*r and*r shall*r shew*r it*r unto*r you.*r
A*rp little*r while,*r and*r ye*r shall*r not*r see*r me:*r and*r again,*r a*r little*r while,*r and*r ye*r shall*r see*r me,*r because*r I*r go*r to*r the*r Father.*r

Then*p said some of his disciples among themselves, What is this that he saith unto us, A*r little*r while,*r and*r ye*r shall*r not*r see*r me:*r and*r again,*r a*r little*r while,*r and*r ye*r shall*r see*r me:*r and,*r Because*r I*r go*r to*r the*r Father?*r
They*p said therefore, What is this that he saith, A*r little*r while?*r we cannot tell what he saith.

Now*p Jesus knew that they were desirous to ask him, and said unto them, Do*r ye*r enquire*r among*r yourselves*r of*r that*r I*r said,*r A*r little*r while,*r and*r ye*r shall*r not*r see*r me:*r and*r again,*r a*r little*r while,*r and*r ye*r shall*r see*r me?*r

Verily,*rp verily,*r I*r say*r unto*r you,*r That*r ye*r shall*r weep*r and*r lament,*r but*r the*r world*r shall*r rejoice:*r and*r ye*r shall*r be*r sorrowful,*r but*r your*r sorrow*r shall*r be*r turned*r into*r joy.*r

A*rp woman*r when*r she*r is*r in*r travail*r hath*r sorrow,*r because*r her*r hour*r is*r come:*r but*r as*r soon*r as*r she*r is*r delivered*r of*r the*r child,*r she*r remembereth*r no*r more*r the*r anguish,*r for*r joy*r that*r a*r man*r is*r born*r into*r the*r world.*r
And*rp ye*r now*r therefore*r have*r sorrow:*r but*r I*r will*r see*r you*r again,*r and*r your*r heart*r shall*r rejoice,*r and*r your*r joy*r no*r man*r taketh*r from*r you.*r
And*rp in*r that*r day*r ye*r shall*r ask*r me*r nothing.*r Verily,*r verily,*r I*r say*r unto*r you,*r Whatsoever*r ye*r shall*r ask*r the*r Father*r in*r my*r name,*r he*r will*r give*r it*r you.*r
Hitherto*rp have*r ye*r asked*r nothing*r in*r my*r name:*r ask,*r and*r ye*r shall*r receive,*r that*r your*r joy*r may*r be*r full.*r

These*rp things*r have*r I*r spoken*r unto*r you*r in*r proverbs:*r but*r the*r time*r cometh,*r when*r I*r shall*r no*r more*r speak*r unto*r you*r in*r proverbs,*r but*r I*r shall*r shew*r you*r plainly*r of*r the*r Father.*r
At*rp that*r day*r ye*r shall*r ask*r in*r my*r name:*r and*r I*r say*r not*r unto*r you,*r that*r I*r will*r pray*r the*r Father*r for*r you:*r
For*rp the*r Father*r himself*r loveth*r you,*r because*r ye*r have*r loved*r me,*r and*r have*r believed*r that*r I*r came*r out*r from*r God.*r
I*rp came*r forth*r from*r the*r Father,*r and*r am*r come*r into*r the*r world:*r again,*r I*r leave*r the*r world,*r and*r go*r to*r the*r Father.*r
His*p disciples said unto him, Lo, now speakest thou plainly, and speakest no proverb.
Now*p are we sure that thou knowest all things, and needest not that any man should ask thee: by this we believe that thou camest forth from God.
Jesus*p answered them, Do*r ye*r now*r believe?*r

Behold,*rp the*r hour*r cometh,*r yea,*r is*r now*r come,*r that*r ye*r shall*r be*r scattered,*r every*r man*r to*r his*r own,*r and*r shall*r leave*r me*r alone:*r and*r yet*r I*r am*r not*r alone,*r because*r the*r Father*r is*r with*r me.*r

These*rp things*r I*r have*r spoken*r unto*r you,*r that*r in*r me*r ye*r might*r have*r peace.*r In*r the*r world*r ye*r shall*r have*r tribulation:*r but*r be*r of*r good*r cheer;*r I*r have*r overcome*r the*r world.*r
